front.title: Network Coding for Enhancing Data Robustness in Low-Power and Lossy Networks

abstract.t: This document specifies a solution for improving the robustness of data transmission in multi-hop Low-Power and Lossy Networks (LLNs). It uses the network coding technique in conjunction with the Routing Protocol for LLNs (RPL) to increase the success rate of data collection at the sink node, with reasonable processing and traffic cost.
